backend/main.mo: Defines core actor data types and state maps for maintenance, expenditures, complaints, notices, visitor requests, users, and notifications, along with helper authorization and validation logic.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata linking features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing their purpose and recent changes.
frontend/deploy/ic-deploy-with-retry.sh: Shell script wrapping dfx deploy with cycles readiness checks, retry logic, and detailed error handling.
frontend/deploy/ic-precreate-canisters.s: Shell script that pre-creates backend and frontend canisters on IC mainnet to avoid CaLM reservation issues.
frontend/deploy/README.md: Documentation describing IC mainnet deployment helper tools and the retry-enabled deployment script.
frontend/docs/deployment-troubleshooting: Troubleshooting guide covering common IC deployment issues, prerequisites, and wallet/cycles checks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens, theming variables, and dark mode values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry page with PWA metadata and a styled startup fallback loader.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: Web app manifest defining PWA settings, icons, colors, and metadata.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling caching, fetch routing, and offline fallbacks for app assets and navigation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app setup with routing, authentication via Internet Identity, profile loading, and startup signaling.
frontend/src/components/FatalStartupErro: UI screen showing a fatal startup error with reload and hard-reload actions.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Top-level layout component handling navigation, user profile, notifications, PWA install prompts, and logout, with responsive mobile menu and dynamic logo loading.
frontend/src/components/layout/Dashboard: Reusable card component displaying an icon, title, optional description, actions, and children with variant styling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating a user profile with name, role, and optional flat number validation.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorBoun: Error boundary capturing early startup errors and rendering the fatal startup screen.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorScre: Recoverable startup error UI offering retry, logout, and hard reload options.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, including login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Handles browser PWA installation prompts and exposes installability state and an install trigger.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for user profiles, maintenance, payments, notifications, and other domain data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark themes, layout defaults, responsive text rules, and print-specific styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, the query client, and the Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/ChangePasswordPage.ts: Provides a password change form with validation, mutation handling, and redirects after successful update.
frontend/src/pages/common/NoticeDetailPa: Displays full details of a selected notice, including title, message, and expiry, with a back-navigation button.
frontend/src/pages/common/NoticesPage.ts: Lists all notices with sorting, secretary-only actions (CSV, print, create), and navigation to notice details.
frontend/src/pages/common/NotificationsP: Shows unread and read notifications with options to mark one or all as read and formats timestamps for display.
frontend/src/pages/flat/ComplaintDetailP: Shows detailed information for a flat-specific complaint, including status, priority, and resolution notes.
frontend/src/pages/flat/ComplaintsPage.t: Provides a form to lodge new complaints and displays existing complaints for the user's flat.
frontend/src/pages/flat/ExpendituresPage: Shows a placeholder page indicating expenditure tracking is unavailable due to missing backend support.
frontend/src/pages/flat/FlatDashboardPag: Displays the flat's main dashboard with quick links to maintenance, expenditures, complaints, notices, visitor requests, and profile management.
Allows users to view maintenance status, pay via UPI, and record payment details for selected months and years.
frontend/src/pages/flat/ProfilePage.tsx: Lets residents view, add, edit, and remove up to four mobile numbers tied to their flat profile.
frontend/src/pages/flat/VisitorRequestsP: Shows visitor requests for the user's flat and enables approving or declining them with flat number validation.
frontend/src/pages/guard/GuardDashboardP: Guard-focused dashboard showing pending visitor requests and navigation to create requests or view notices.
frontend/src/pages/guard/VisitorRequestC: Form page for guards to create visitor requests, validate fields, submit via mutation, and open a WhatsApp approval message.
frontend/src/pages/guard/VisitorRequestD: Displays details of a specific visitor request with status, flat info, and navigation back to the list.
frontend/src/pages/guard/VisitorRequests: Lists all visitor requests with status badges, supports navigation to details, and links to create new requests.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Implements the login screen using Internet Identity with error handling and optional custom logo loading.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/ComplaintsA: Admin dashboard for viewing, exporting, and printing all complaints with summary stats.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/ComplaintsR: Print-friendly page rendering all complaints with counts and triggers auto-printing.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/components/: Skeleton loading UI for the secretary settings page, showing placeholder cards for logo and configuration sections.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/CreateNotic: Form for creating notices with optional expiry date and submitting via mutation.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/Expenditure: Page for recording, editing, exporting, and printing monthly expenditure entries with dynamic item management.
Print-friendly view that loads a month's expenditures and triggers browser print once data is ready.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/NoticesRepo: Print view that loads all notices, sorts them by ID, and displays them in a table before auto-printing.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/OverduePage: Displays overdue flats for a selected period with month/year filters and overdue-period warnings.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/PaymentsPag: Management page showing payment status for all flats with CSV export and print options.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/PaymentsRep: Print-friendly report showing payment statuses for all flats for a chosen month and year.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/SecretaryDa: Dashboard linking to payments, overdue, expenditures, complaints, notices, and settings sections with quick stats.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/SettingsPag: React page for managing secretary settings, including logo upload, form state, validation, and saving updates. Handles dirty detection and syncing with fetched settings.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Utilities to escape CSV fields, generate CSV text from objects, and trigger CSV downloads in the browser.
frontend/src/utils/dates.ts: Date helpers for current month/year, formatting timestamps, listing months, and generating a small year range.
frontend/src/utils/flatNumbers.ts: Generates and validates society flat numbers within defined ranges and formats them for display.
frontend/src/utils/hardReload.ts: Clears caches and service workers then forces a full page reload.
frontend/src/utils/overdue.ts: Determines if the current date is overdue and whether an overdue notice should be shown.
frontend/src/utils/print.ts: Opens a print view in a new tab and triggers the browser print dialog.
frontend/src/utils/sanitizeError.ts: Sanitizes error messages by extracting safe text, truncating long content, and redacting sensitive patterns.
frontend/src/utils/settingsValidation.ts: Validation helpers for secretary settings fields and normalization utilities for consistent comparison.
frontend/src/utils/upi.ts: Builds a UPI deep link for payments using a UPI ID, amount, and note.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including hashâ€‘based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Builds a WhatsApp deep link using a cleaned phone number and encoded message.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file describing a fix request for secretary settings not saving due to incorrect dirty-check logic.
